name: Lucky Snow Delight
effect:
Restores 30–35% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 510–930 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: A Liyue confection made from rice. The grains are ground into flour and then mixed with sugar and water before being pressed into molds and steamed to become a snow-white cake that evokes the promise of a rich and plentiful harvest.

suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 510 HP every 5s for 30s.
suspicious.description: A Liyue confectionery made from rice. Its flavor is mild and ordinary, so forgettable that it vanishes from your mind almost immediately after the last bite.

normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 730 HP every 5s for 30s.
normal.description: A Liyue confection made from rice. The grains are ground into flour and then mixed with sugar and water before being pressed into molds and steamed to become a snow-white cake that evokes the promise of a rich and plentiful harvest.

delicious.effect: Restores 35% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 930 HP every 5s for 30s.
delicious.description: A Liyue confection made from rice. Pure and white as fresh snow, it melts the moment it touches your tongue, offering a clean, delicate sweetness that lingers like a gentle echo.
